entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.0°C

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 23 January 2023
